info.description: Retrieves the Bill Details of an account
info.title: Retrieves the Bill Details of an account

get.summary: Retrieves the Outstanding amount to be paid for an account
get.description: Retrieves the Outstanding amount to be paid for an account

parameters.name: arrangementId
parameters.description: Indicates an unique identifier of an account

parameters.name: simulationReference
parameters.description: Indicates the Reference ID for simulation activity

parameters.name: paymentDate
parameters.description: The date on which a payment is due

parameters.name: deferDate
parameters.description: Date that the payment has been deferred to

parameters.name: billedAmount
parameters.description: Indicates the bill amount

parameters.name: outstandingAmount
parameters.description: Contains the aggregate outstanding principal amount thereof after giving effect to any borrowings and prepayments or repayments of Committed Loans

parameters.name: delinquentAmount
parameters.description: Indicates the bill amount during the ageing status(Bill which crossed the due date)

parameters.name: property
parameters.description: The corresponding property

parameters.name: billStatus
parameters.description: Indicates the status of a bill(Issued,Due,Ageing,Settled)

parameters.name: settlementStatus
parameters.description: Defines the status of the settlement for the incoming MT548 swift message.The values allowed are: Waiting : pending to receive settlement status update meaning pending to receive MT548 swift message,  Action required : awaiting action to be performed to get the final update on settlement status.Matched : transactions whose nominals have matched with the depository position

parameters.name: agingStatus
parameters.description: Indicates the ageing status of a bill

parameters.name: settled
parameters.description: Flag to indicate whether a bill is settled or not

parameters.name: paymentType
parameters.description: Indicates if the payment is Customer (C) type or Bank (B) type

parameters.name: billDate
parameters.description: Indicates a date on which a bill has been raised

parameters.name: billType
parameters.description: The type of payment obligation generated

parameters.name: paymentMethod
parameters.description: Method chosen to make the payment

parameters.name: infoPayType
parameters.description: Indicates a bill which is raised when a loan is paid off

parameters.name: advancePayment
parameters.description: Indicates whether advance payment made is set on an account

parameters.name: paymentIndicator
parameters.description: Indicates whether its a credit/debit type of bill

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: The total number of records per page

parameters.name: page_start
parameters.description: The record from which the response should be displayed

parameters.name: page_token
parameters.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request.

parameters.name: credentials
parameters.description: Username and password to authenticate the API against core-banking.

parameters.name: companyId
parameters.description: The identifier of the underlying Entity/Company/Branch.

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

page_size.description: The total number of records per page

total_size.description: The total number of records present

page_token.description: Unique id expected to get as part of response from t24 on every enquiry request

billDate.description: Indicates a date on which a bill has been raised

billType.description: The type of payment obligation generated

billed.description: Indicates the total billed amount of a bill

outstanding.description: The remaining monetary amount on a loan

status.description: Status identifier of the account. The values are 'DELETED' if the account is closed, 'BLOCKED' is there are any posting restrictions & 'ENABLED' for active accounts.

billStatus.description: Indicates the status of a bill(Issued,Due,Ageing,Settled)

T24_time.description: Time taken to response by T24

requestParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the request by IRIS

responseParse_time.description: Time taken to parse the response by IRIS

code.description: The identifier of the error message
The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message for bad requests

type.description: The identifier of error type: Business

code.description: The identifier of the error message

message.description: The actual t24 error message caused by server

type.description: The identifier of error type: System

billdate.description: Indicates a date on which a bill has been raised

billType.description: The type of payment obligation generated

originalAmount.description: Indicates the original amount of the bill

currentOutstanding.description: Indicates the current outstanding amount of the bill

deferredTill.description: Indicates the date until the bill was deferred.

dueDate.description: Identifies the date on which the activity is due.

infoCharge.description: Indicates the kind of charge which was billed.

billDate.description: Indicates a date on which a bill has been raised

billType.description: The type of payment obligation generated

outstandingAmount.description: Contains the aggregate outstanding principal amount thereof after giving effect to any borrowings and prepayments or repayments of Committed Loans

billStatus.description: Indicates the status of a bill(Issued,Due,Ageing,Settled)

billDate.description: Indicates a date on which a bill has been raised

billType.description: The type of payment obligation generated

originalAmount.description: Indicates the original amount of the bill

repaidAmount.description: Indicates the amount which was repaid from the customer

remainingAmount.description: Indicates the remaining amount which need to be paid by the customer

settledOn.description: IIndiactes the date on which the bill was settled.

paymentDate.description: The date on which a payment is due

billType.description: The type of payment obligation generated

totAdjustAmount.description: Indicates the adjusted amount which is writtenoff from the bill

writtenOffOn.description: Indicates the date on which the bill is writtenoff
